snippet.title: Fort Hood shooter was Iraq vet being treated for mental health issues
snippet.description:
* Spc. Ivan Lopez's friendly smile apparently gave no hint of a history of depression, anxiety and other psychiatric disorders.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/04/02/us/fort-hood-shooter-profile/index.html

snippet.title: From snail mail to 4G, China celebrates 20 years of Internet connectivity
snippet.description:

snippet.title: Smartphone innovation has stalled, but that's OK
snippet.description:
* Here's a short message to smartphone makers before you try to wow us with a bunch of glitzy features in your next device: Don't do it.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/04/18/tech/mobile/smartphone-innovation-kovach/index.html

snippet.title: 'Modest hope' to slow warming, but no 'free lunch,' U.N. warns
snippet.description:
* Keeping global warming down to a level people can live with means cutting carbon emissions to "near zero" by the end of the century, even in an increasingly industrialized world, the top U.N. experts on the issue reported Sunday.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/04/13/world/un-climate/index.html

snippet.title: Are suspected North Korean drones a threat to South Korea?
snippet.description:

http://www.cnn.com/2014/04/09/world/asia/korea-drones-military-threat/index.html

snippet.title: We will fight the NRA with common sense
snippet.description:
* A year ago on Thursday, the U.S. Senate failed to pass a bill that would have helped fix our nation's gun laws by requiring background checks on all purchases of firearms. Ninety percent of all Americans -- and more than 80% of gun owners -- believe that all people should be subject to such checks. And even though the bill won majority support in t...
http://www.cnn.com/2014/04/17/opinion/bloomberg-watts-gun-control-initiative/index.html
